subtitle.text5: , Reli is your partner for growth.

selling.title: Selling with Reli is easy
selling.description: Just send us your product details - we upload and promote them for you.

why_choose_reli.description: Everything you need to succeed as an online seller, all in one powerful platform designed to maximize your sales and minimize your effort.

block1.label: Easy Conditions
block1.title: Zero Effort for Manufacturers
block1.text: No need to upload or manage products. Our team lists and optimizes everything for you.

block2.label: 24/7 Available
block2.title: Personal Manager Support
block2.text: Every seller has a dedicated manager who knows your business.

block3.label: 100% Risk-Free
block3.title: Lowest Fees in the Market
block3.text: Keep more of your profits with our ultra-competitive commission rates.

block4.label: Guaranteed
block4.title: No Risk
block4.text: No setup fees, no hidden charges. You only pay when you sell.

block5.label: 100% Free
block5.title: Free Promotion
block5.text: Your products can be featured in banners, promotions, and campaigns at no commission.

block6.label: High-Quality Products
block6.title: High-Quality Marketplace
block6.text: We carefully select sellers and products to keep standards high.

ready_to_start.title: Ready to start selling?
ready_to_start.subtitle: Join successful sellers who have already discovered the power of Reli. No commitments, no risks, just results.

how_it_works.main_title: We keep it simple. You focus on production - we handle the sales setup

step1.label: Contact Our Manager
step1.text: Send us an email and share your business details.

step3.label: Send Product Info
step3.text: Share your product catalog, photos, and prices. Our moderators upload and optimize your listings.

step4.label: Start Selling and Get Paid
step4.text: Your products go live, and you receive payouts.

testimonials_section.subtitle: Join thousands of successful sellers who have grown their business with Reli.one.

comment2.quote: "The analytics tools help me understand my customers better. Sales have increased by 300% since joining Reli.one. Best decision for my business."
